title.narrative: GOVERNANCE AND SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Office Management Costs, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Leadership And Executive Direction, Oversight And Assurance, Policy, Guidance And Technical Support For Country Programming And Reporting, Technical Leadership For Programme Outcomes, Transparency In Information And Official Documents. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Office Management Costs

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Office Management Costs

description.narrative: UNICEF Nepal implemented the Global Shared Service Centre and began using my case services portal. It is an active member of OMT and 99 per cent of IB budget was utilized. Full Implementation of GSSC | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: 5 emergency site offices are closed by end of December 2017
Percentage of TA open more than 15 days

actual.value: 2017:Status Update of indicator:Total TA: 2270Percentage of those open for more than 15 days (as of Dec) 0.13 per cent.

title.narrative: CPMP prepared and submitted to ROSA by last week of August 2017

actual.value: 2017:The Country Office managed to submit the CPD and CPMP documents on time.

title.narrative: Percentage of CRC document timely submitted to the CRC committee by Supply and HR with no rejection by the committee
Standard Operations Procedures (SOP) for ten key office process prepared in line with VISION, approved by CMT and all staff oriented on the SOP by 30 November 2013.

target.value: :SOPs prepared and approved by CMT and Staff trained by 30 Nov 2013

actual.value: 2013:Completed.SOP fully implemented and efficiency gains are being achieved through reduced processing time.

title.narrative: Representative exercises overall financial accountability and efficient management of the Institutional Budget to ensure 98% utilization and for the intended purpose.

actual.value: 2014:•64% of Budget properly utilized for the intended purpose (as of 31 December 2014)

title.narrative: Representative exercises overall financial accountability and efficient management of the Institutional Budget to ensure 95% utilization and for the intended purpose.
SOPs reviewed and documented and staff trained in line with GSSC implementation and phase out of push & track

target.value: 2017:All SoPs revised in line with evolving change due to GSSC and phase out of P&T

actual.value: 2017:As described output analytical statement of progress, the relevant SOPS were revised in line with the phase out of Push & Track.

title.narrative: Office prepared for external audit and addressed all audit recommendations

target.value: 2016:All the audit recommendations addressed and closed by the office

actual.value: 2017:Only a single recommendation remains to be addressed. All others have been acted on. The final recommendation will be addressed in 2018.

title.narrative: Office prepared for internal audit and addressed all audit recommendations

actual.value: 2014:• Internal Audit Completed in April 2014. Final OIAI audit report received in August 2014, Action Plan developed and first response submitted on 30 September 2014. Out of 13 recommendations 5 are closed by OIAI representing 38% complete. Plan to send second response in mid-January 2015. The goal of

title.narrative: Seven Statutory office committees (CMT, JCP, CRB, CRC, PSB, HRDT, PCA) membership revised, monitored and achieved results as per their ToRs on annual basis.

baseline.value: Membership of seven Statutory Office committees and TOR

target.value: 2014:Membership of Seven Statutory Office Committees revised by April 2014 and functional

actual.value: 2014:All Statutory Office Committees performed satisfactorily and prepared their meeting minutes timely. No of Statutory MeetingCMT9JCP1CRB3CRC10PSB2HRDT3PCA 19

title.narrative: Risk profile of the office updated by December

actual.value: 2017:The risk profile has been updated and available in the common network drive in country office.

title.narrative: UN Nepal Country Office renovation in UN House building contract awarded by 15 July 2013, project monitored and completed by 31 January 2014

baseline.value: Old NCO office in UN House

actual.value: 2013:Completed.Renovation projected properly monitored and completed within target time

title.narrative: BSC performance monthly monitored and quarterly evaluated

target.value: 2014:VISION BSC functional, monthly monitored and quarterly evaluated.

actual.value: 2014:• All BSC staff in place• Service Level Agreement (SLA) with Bhutan CO and ROSA signed and put in action

title.narrative: VISION BSC setup, Staff trained and implemented by 30/10/2013
Push and Track (P&T) implemented in UNICEF Nepal, Bhutan and ROSA and Travel2field implement in Nepal Country Office and Zone offices

baseline.value: Service Level Agreements with ROSA & Bhutan

target.value: 2014:Push & Track (P&T) implemented for management of documents for smooth transaction in VISION

actual.value: 2014:• All relevant UNICEF NCO and ROSA staff trained on P&T from 27-30 January 2014.• One day workshop held on aligning SOP to P&T on 21 February 2014.• Relevant staff of Bhutan CO trained on P&T from 24-26 March 2014.• Installation testing of P & T conducted in March 2014• Nutrition, WASH, Emergenc

title.narrative: Eleven Statutory office committees (CMT, JCP, CRB, CRC, PSB, HRDT, PRC, JCC, LSSC, Polling Officers, PSV) membership revised, monitored and achieved results as per their ToRs on annual basis

actual.value: 2017:As described above statutory committees have been updated and recorded on file.

title.narrative: Table of Authority reviewed, updated and aligned with segregation of roles

actual.value: 2017:As indicated, the TOA has been updated and available on common drive and UNICEF Nepal team site

title.narrative: Statutory Committees updated and well functioning

actual.value: 2017:Revised Committees are available on UNICEF Nepal team site
